response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to me. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $9,500. This price reflects its true worth while leaving room for negotiation within a reasonable range. I understand that the product's value to you is $8,000, so I hope this proposal strikes a balance that meets both our expectations. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or if you would like to make an offer. I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 9500}
